So you're looking for something new by Frank Darabont, and since you mentioned X, I'm assuming you want a movie that has no connection to the author's usual dark fantasy genre. You've also got Tom Welling on your mind, which narrows it down quite a bit!

I'd recommend "War of the Worlds" (2005) starring Tom Cruise, where he plays a desperate father trying to protect his family from an alien invasion. It's a thrilling sci-fi adventure that should keep you on the edge of your seat!
